abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide studies and
            investments to improve and expand the capacity of the
            borrower's Congo-Ocean Railway (CFCO). The major
            components would include: (i) final engineering study and
            preparation of cost estimates for the realignment of the
            Holle-Dolisie section of the railway; (ii) improvement and
            replacement of track; (iii) improvement of existing
            equipment (iv) acquisition of new equipment; and (v) study
            of ATC's costs and revenues.
